CHAT.comment: INV uncovers computer box.
child tries to pick up box and mom goes over.
mom crouches down by child and whispers in her ear.
mom points to lights at top.
child leans over and computer box beeps.
mom and child lean over computer box and whisper together simultaneously.
mom mumbles something as she crawls over to the other side of the table.
lights go off and mom laughs.
it appears that child touches the computer box with her nose.
child and mom laugh for a while.
mom points to moving lights and child touches the middle of the computer box.
mom tries to touch the lights and child motions her away.
child demonstrates how she thinks the computer box works by touching it with your nose.
mom touches box and lights go off.
mom continues to laugh and touch the box.
child touches it with her nose again and the box beeps.
child imitates the sound the computer box makes.
child taps box.
mom presses box.
mom touches red lights.
child touches box again with her nose and mom laughs.
mom imitates face child made and they talk simultaneously.
child stands up on chair and points to starfish tank.
child touches box and gets down from chair and walks away.
INV covers computer box.
INV pulls cover off starfish tank.
INV leaves the room.
mom looks around the tank.
mom laughs.
mom pulls child onto her lap to peer into the tank.
mom and child look very intensely into tank.
mom points at starfish.
mom makes noise and moves her finger to imitate the motion of the starfish's arms.
mom repeats this and whispers something to child.
child motions movement of starfish.
child becomes distracted and starts making faces, dancing, and humming.
mom points into tank.
mom is touching glass and child grabs her hand away.
mom is looking around tank and these comments were unclear and difficult to decipher.
child points into tank.
INV comes into the room.
INV covers up starfish tank.
INV brings in degu.
INV leaves.
mom points in direction of starfish tank.
degu is standing against glass.
mom scratches child's ears.
mom whispers and points to bedding then talks to degu.
speaking simultaneously.
child imitates degu's paws on the glass.
degu moves around in cage and mom and child giggle.
mom points to something in cage.
mom and child laugh.
child touches top of cage.
child touches top of cage.
child laughs.
child reaches for top of cage again.
child murmurs something.
mom and child laugh then speak simultaneously.
child pinches her nose.
child pinches her nose again.
child imitates behavior of degu and makes playful noises.
child continues to imitate motions and make squeaking sounds.
child goes and lays down on the sofa.
child covers up her stomach.
child flashes her stomach.
mom sits on the floor and looks into degu's cage.
mom motions for child to come back over to cage and whispers to child.
child flashes mother and the mirror.
child lifts shirt again and makes strange noises.
mom taps on glass.
child comes back over and INV comes in the room.
INV takes degu cage.
child points at microphone over starfish tank.
INV sets car on floor and leaves.
child pushes car.
mom puts finger in back part of the car.
child opens front part of car.
mom crouches down in front of car.
child gets up to play with car on the table and mom taps table with her knuckles.
mom touches car.
mom taps car and it rolls off the table.
child doesn't respond.
mom points to driver's seat.
mom points to passenger's seat.
mom points to seat in car.
child points to trunk and mom laughs.
child points to back of car.
mom wheels car around table and makes driving noises.
mom and child laugh.
child makes sounds while pushing the car and then the mom puts her hands in front of the car.
child pushes car into mom's hands then goes around them.
mom sets her hands on the table to make a wall.
child pushes car around the “wall and mom laughs while child continues making car noises.
child says something unintelligible about tapping while tapping on the front of the car pretending to let Firstname out.
child pretends to go pick Firstname up.
child points to front compartment.
mom and child laugh.
child makes different noise while pushing car around.
child sets car on the floor and plays there.
mom points to the couch while child plays on the floor.
child wheels car toward the couch and then towards the covered computer box.
mom laughs and gets down on the floor with child.
child points to several spots in the room.
mom points toward the mirror.
child moves car behind computer box and makes more noises.
INV takes car out of room.
child goes over by the couch and waves her arms making more sounds.
INV hands child the meerkat.
child makes excited sounds.
INV leaves.
child carries meerkat over in front of the mirror.
mom moves closer to play along with the child.
mom makes crying sounds pretending to be the baby crying.
child picks up the meerkat and touches its mouth.
mom laughs.
mom points to their reflection in the mirror.
child coughs.
mom touches meerkat's paws.
mom makes meerkat kiss child on the cheek.
mom makes meerkat bounce all around and attack child playfully.
child coughs.
mom takes meerkat and plays with it then child hugs it.
child starts to say something unintelligible simultaneously.
mom and child are sitting at table examining meerkat and mom speaks for it.
child whispers to mom.
child rubs mom's face with the meerkat's paws.
mom makes swishing noises after child carries the meerkat to the couch.
child rocks meerkat back and forth.
child pretends to put the meerkat down for a nap on the couch and mumbles softly.
child carries meerkat over to the table.
child carries meerkat back to the couch.
INV comes in.
INV takes the meerkat.
this exchange between mom and child is slurred and difficult to decipher.
INV sets robodog on the floor.
INV leaves the room.
mom gets down on the ground and barks at the robodog.
child says something simultaneously.
mom and child pet robodog and laugh.
child touches area on robodog.
child pushes button.
child puts her hand in the robodog's mouth.
mom touches the ears.
mom and child touch the robodog and its head moves.
robodog shakes head and mom laughs loudly.
child touches robodog's button.
mom laughs again.
mom starts to say something simultaneously.
mom taps child on her knee.
mom pretends to tickle the robodog.
mom barks at robodog and it closes its mouth on her fingers.
mom laughs and child shouts loudly.
mom and child whisper softly to each other unintelligibly.
mom barks at robodog and laughs.
child whispers something to mother.
mom puts her finger in its mouth and giggles.
INV takes robodog.
